entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine AppOfflineDroppedWhileSiteStarting_SiteShutsDown_InProcess #60482
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #60478
  • Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.RevalidatingServerAuthenticationStateProviderTest.SuppliesCancellationTokenThatSignalsWhenRevalidationLoopIsBeingDiscarded #60472
  • Polymorphic derived types do not have discriminator property marked as required in OpenAPI schema. #60469
  • Update OpenTelemetry semantic conventions to include AuthN/AuthZ metrics #60468
  • Add authentication failure reason to AuthN metrics #60467
  • XML doc generation support should resovle inheritdoc in additional files #60466
    Backlog
  • Generate OpenAPI documents at build-time ignores configured customisations #60463
  • First class http patch support #60462
  • [Blazor] WebAssembly package version missmatch with SDK/RuntimePack version #60461
    .NET 10 Planning
  • openapi with newtonsoft.json suppport generate incorrect request/response model schema #60458
  • dotnet dev-certs https --check Shows Certificate Invalid on macOS #60474
  • PackageOverrides.txt in targeting pack should list Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #60456

Closed

  • Add IsLocalUrl Support For Endpoint Method #24486
    Backlog
  • Make blazor.server.js compatible with strict CSS CSP #58629
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Enable custom text in the new (.Net 9.0) reconnect dialog #57453
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot #60378
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #60377
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot #60364
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot #60349
  • .NET 9 OpenAPI not working with nullable property with MaxLengthAttribute #59428
  • [Blazor] NavigationManager is no longer resolvable outside Razor pages. #60454
  • [SignalR] NullReferenceException in SignalR.ClientProxyExtensions.SendAsync #60449
  • OpenIdConnectProtocolException: IDX21314: OpenIdConnectProtocol requires the jwt token to have an 'aud' claim. #57938
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Routes not work in blazor #60409

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine SuppliesCancellationTokenThatSignalsWhenRevalidationLoopIs… #60473
    area-blazor
  • Fix handling for more method signature types #60464
    area-mvc
  • view-data-* attribute for partial tag helper #60459
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix installer package versioning #60457
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview2
  • Increase Grpc InteropTests timeout #60471
    area-grpc, 10.0-preview2
  • Revert "Update branding to preview3" #60470
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview2
  • Fix: OpenAPI Schema Handling For Nullable Collection Types #60460
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview2
  • Add reconnect UI component to the Blazor template #60376
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview2

Updated

  • Avoid IISHttpServer close race on construction #60399
    area-networking
  • Enhance Lockout Functionality: Add Test for AccessFailedAsync Incrementing Count #60350
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Abstract away the TestServer dependency from WebApplicationBuilder #60247
    area-networking
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi to the webapiaot template (with an optional flag to disable it) #60337
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.2.25117.1 #60451
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • Simplify PublicTopLevelProgramGenerator #60222
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Extensions: clarify naming conventions, capture more open issues #9154
  • Clarify partial event attribute targets #9150

Merged

  • Queue extensions topics #9155
  • Extensions: prepare notes for LDM discussion #9153

Updated

  • Extensions: Clarify accessibility in metadata format #9130

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Inline computed properties #35647
  • CLI: adding migration throws exception on MacOS #35649

Updated

  • Background and information around the 9.0 PendingModelChangesWarning error #35285
    Discussions
  • Assignment to inherited field, bypassing an hiding field #35643
  • Investigate single query related entity loading and orderings #29171
    Backlog
  • JsonB enum column with JsonStringEnumConverter is handled as (casted to) integer during projection #35650
  • Comparing `DbSet<T>`/`IQueryable<T>` to `null` in query fails #35598
    Backlog
  • Support `HasConversion` to primitive collection types #33688
    Backlog
  • Can I use `[ConcurrencyCheck]` with Cosmos DB to capture concurrent updates. If not, then how I can detect a concurrent update that failed. #35648
  • Named query filters #8576
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe to 6.1.1 conditionally #35651

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell flyout throws an exception on Android if there's a FragmentLifecycle.Callback #27889
  • .NET MAUI App Not Supported on Redmi A3 After .NET 8 to 9 Upgrade #27886
  • MAUI Blazor Refreshview shows disabled spinner on Windows #27882
  • MauiContext is `null` in `Application.CreateWindow()` on Android #27881
  • [iOS] Cannot remove a Shadow at runtime #27879
  • Random crashes in iOS and Android #27875
  • IOS: PlatformView cannot be null here (Microsoft.Maui.IEditor) #27872
  • [Unstable]D11-When deploying the app to Android on some machines, cursive fonts didn't display correctly. #27868
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Maui -9.0.40 error : Failed to AOT compile SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 139. #27867
  • [iOS 18] list does not render correctly in label with TextType="Html" #27866
  • Issue with iOS App Crashing in Test Flight #27865

Closed

  • [.NET 10] Internalize/remove MessagingCenter #16813
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Android] ListView + DataTemplateSelector + HasUnevenRows issue #24701
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Button background not appearing when setting Gradient and Shadow #12959
    Backlog
  • [iOS] App Crash on Startup when Interpreter is used with Release configuration. #27840
  • Release of maui 9.0 on the Windows platform #27869
  • .net 9 Android ignoring Android primary color #27850

PullRequests

Created

  • remove Dispose call on ShellItemRenderer #27890
    community ✨
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #27888
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, area-controls-dialog, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Windows] Fix Indicator View Causing Looping Issue with CarouselView #27880
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 2 #27878
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix "PlatformView cannot be null here" Exception using VisualStates #27877
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Testing] - Reenable UITest VerifyInitialEntryReturnTypeChange with Adjustments for Navigation Bar Height Discrepancies on Android #27876
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix flaky tests 6 #27874
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Windows] Fixed Shadow not updated when Clipping a View with a shadow #27873
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed a crash in CarouselViewHandler2 on iOS 15. #27871
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Adding some copilot instructions #27864

Merged

  • Internalize/remove MessagingCenter #27842
    t/breaking 💥, area-architecture, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [ci] Move to Sequoia machines #27787
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR5
  • Don't need to register ApplicationStub #27885
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 11029468 #27789
  • Revert "Fix concurrency issues and leak reliability" #27870
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [ci] Update slnf location and arcade #27860
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #27863
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • BindableLayout should dispatch layout changes when collection changes from background thread #24714
    area-layout, do-not-merge, community ✨
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • IDE0059 incorrectly triggers when assigning to the indexer of a value type #77258
  • IDE0079 triggering false positives on various suppressed diagnostics #75887
  • No error when using nameof(collection[index]). Instead the compiler crashes on build #77228
    17.14
  • Investigate cleanup of CachingSemanticModelProvider #77220
    Backlog
  • Implement nullable analysis for setters of properties using field keyword #77215
    .NET 10
  • "Rename failed to apply edits" after trying to rename classes in files opened after file operations #68565
    Backlog
  • Allow to change the behavior for interfaces for rule IDE0040: Accessibility modifiers required #77253

PullRequests

Created

  • Update System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe to 6.1.1 #77267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update PublicAPI files for 17.13 ship #77266
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Merge main to runtime async branch #77265
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Update to release nuget packages #77261
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Emit extension implementation methods #77197
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add initial runtime async spike #76121
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Add missing word the documentation file #77259
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection expression arguments: support [CollectionBuilder] factory methods #76998
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix override completion when attribute below #77242
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix Quick Info nullability display for backing fields #77240
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Generate Documentation Auto-Insert #76665
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Sem search signature #74480
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: Initial work to support bulk renaming of files to match types contained within. #77239
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: Bind invocations and member accesses #77172
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything
  • Add Copilot UI prototype to Semantic Search window #77222
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix issues with source packages #77187
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Partial events and constructors: attributes #77182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deadlock in asynchronous DNS resolution #112663
  • Add Support for Brotli Compression with Shared Dictionaries in .NET #112656
  • Matrix4x4.CreatePerspectiveFieldOfView ArgumentOutOfRangeException #112655
  • Unhandled `AggregateException` caused by `StreamPipeWriter.FlushInternalAsync` #112651
  • [API Proposal]: Get wasm custom sections inside assembly #112649
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 22 Regressions on 2/13/2025 12:40:20 AM +00:00 #112657
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 24 Regressions on 2/14/2025 8:07:17 PM +00:00 #112658
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 6 Regressions on 2/11/2025 10:40:48 AM +00:00 #112659
  • Crash in Methodical_r1 on CET #112646
  • SerialPort ReadBufferSize cant set properly in Ubuntu #112643

Closed

  • Implement IPv6InterfaceStatistics #40411
  • Is it possible to create valid type for any genericParameter using TypeBuilder? #112317
  • JIT: Test failed global::JitTest_castclass_ldloc_cs.TestClass.TestEntryPoint #112281
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Adding a Virtual `SetTarget` Method to `System.Attribute` for Efficient Target Association #112245
  • [Android][Tests] Android library tests with content items fail: `Could not find a part of the path /data/data` #112558
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces() returning Description same as Friendly name. #111520
  • JIT: Block clonning for subsequent bounds checks #112524
    10.0.0
  • Neighboring bounds checks aren't collapsed #109983
    10.0.0
  • unreliable codegen around vbroadcastss in .NET 8 release builds #96156
    8.0.x
  • [s390x] System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: OverflowException in LdapSessionOptions.ProtocolVersion on Big Endian #112390
  • WinForms Desktop application (.NET 8 & .NET 9) crashes randomly with corclr.dll errors #112598
    Future
  • Cannot reuse Unix Domain Socket on Windows #71291
    Future
  • Native AOT routine always calls vswhere/vsvars all and it ends up taking a lot of time #112648

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Clean-up reflection stack and unify type name parsers. #112670
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix `PipeWriter.AsStream(bool)` xmldoc #112669
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • JIT: Don't use `Compiler::compFloatingPointUsed` to check if FP kills are needed #112668
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabling CI for APX #112667
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix exception handling in the prestub worker - take 2 #112666
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • JIT: Delete old `GenTreeCall` ABI information #112665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use `fgCalledCount` for OSR method entry weight #112662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • testing CI #112661
    area-Build-mono
  • Handle overlapped groups of bounds checks #112660
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] DAC like entry point #112653
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `LclVarDsc::GetArgReg` and `LclVarDsc::GetOtherArgReg` uses #112652
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use osx.13.arm64.open queue for osx testing #112647
    needs-area-label
  • FileSystem: guard against stack overflow in recursive delete (#84344) #112644
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Narrow AddressFamily passed to getaddrinfo when IPv6 is unsupported #112642
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • Use Avx10.2 Instructions in Floating Point Conversions #111775
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up and optimize call arg lowering #112639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support `FIELD_LIST` for returns #112308
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [android] Fix java runner to not assume zip format when unzipping #112654
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Allow publishing AndroidSampleApp with R2R using in-build crossgen2 #112547
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Fix BMI peephole asserts #111837
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Experiment] Clone blocks with bounds checks #112595
  • JIT: Use `fgCalledCount` in inlinee weight computation #112499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [System.DirectoryServices.Protocols] Fix ProtocolVersion Overflow on Big Endian Systems #112391
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Update DbDataSource.cs #112609
    area-System.Data, community-contribution

Updated

  • Implement ExportPkcs12 #112569
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix new EH hang on DebugBreak #112640
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Support disassembling single file bundle for ILSpy #112541
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • CoreCLR interpreter basic compilation and execution #112369
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: Accelerate Vector.Dot for all base types #111853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add support for LDAPTLS_CACERTDIR \ TrustedCertificateDirectory #112531
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.4
  • Use encode callback instead of renting a buffer to write to in DSAKeyFormatHelper #112638
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • Move some links to other doc #112574
    area-Meta
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand `Span<T>` capture #112543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • JIT: Refactor around impDevirtualizeCall for GVM devirt #112610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update a few stresslogs for the frame identifiers #112555
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #111791
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Enable containment for BMI2 shift and rotate instructions #111778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] remove EXPORT_EXCEPTION_HANDLING_HELPERS #111033
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `BitConvertor` #112616
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix path to `dotnet.sh` in `AndroidSampleApp` project #112590
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] Move generation of SuggestedBindingRedirects.targets to inner build #112487
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 9.0.4
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for LDAPTLS_CACERTDIR \ TrustedCertificateDirectory #112530
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.15
  • More clean up to debugger attribute tests #112450
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: fix local assertion prop error for partial local comparisons #112539
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.4
  • JIT: Handle containment for shift instructions with EVEX encoding #111644
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize shift operations for BigInteger #112632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser] samplepoint instrumentation into Mono profiler #112352
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Emit `cmp (extended register)` on ARM64 to simplify cast-then-compare expressions #112411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tensor primitives divide int32 #111505
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] NativeAOT/Arm64: Do not overwrite gcinfo tracking registers for TLS #112549
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.4
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TESTING ONLY] Add another set of debugging prints for stack overflow issue #112284
    NO-MERGE, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Generate calls to interface methods through resolve helper #112406
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] build paltests #112404
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Use a unified cache for SSL_CTX objects #112567
    area-System.Net.Security
  • arm64: Change EQ/NE node to SETCC if the operand supports the zero flag #112235
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Always track the context for late devirt #112396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set AppContext.BaseDirectory and the lookup path for AssemblyDirectory to the directory containing the NativeAOT module #112457
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement the "compact dispatch sections" optimization from CoreCLR's ComWrappers implementation in NativeAOT's implementation #112461
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Problem with boxing in resume stub when return type is a struct instantiated over object type #3010

PullRequests

Created

  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Functional tests for `InitWithCopy` and `Destroy` functions in value witness table #3009
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Document memory ownership and handling at the Swift–C# boundary #3008
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove various file reading (Linux specific) paths #2952
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge feb25 #2993
  • [Swift shipping] Setup MacCatalyst tests on the CI #2998
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift language features] Implement `Foundation.Data` wrapper for the `CryptoKit` in C# #3000
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift Bindings] Initialize bound generics handling #3003
    area-SwiftBindings
  • Implement a change in IL API to use RuntimeHelpers.Await<T>(Task<T>) and similar helpers. #2951

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `GivenDotnetTest` Failures #46923
  • [ApiDiff] Change the default attributes to exclude to the ones we use for ref file generation #46922
  • Change in argument handling in `dotnet run` between 9.0.103 and 9.0.200 #46912
  • Randomly failing build due to missing SDK #46910
    Discussion
  • Unimplemented Tests: WorkloadSetInstallationRecordIsWrittenCorrectly and TurnOffWorkloadSetUpdateMode #46905

Closed

  • [ApiCompat] Not catching removal of abstract keyword #46794
  • SDK 9.0.x installation or update breaks VS 2022 #46828
  • IDE0040 error on interface after upgrading to .NET 9.0.200 #46778
  • Cannot convert from void to IEnumerable<byte> on SDK 9.0.200 #46801
  • 9.0.200 sdk has lots of dependencies on the 4.13.0.0 compiler which has not been released #46892

PullRequests

Created

  • Add installer tests project #46927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use package download in generate layout #46925
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make DefineStaticWebAssets incremental #46920
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Disable Flaky GivenDotnetTest Tests #46924
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Update code owners for R2R related code #46858
  • [ApiCompat] Warn if abstract keyword is removed from member #46797
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Validate Signing on Mac + Linux #46652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use package download in bundled dotnet tools #46914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Skip attribute with issue link for unimplemented tests #46907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in Crossgen.targets #46913
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #46908
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Logger and MSBuild --verbosity option to dotnet test #46909
    Area-dotnet test
  • Remove app host packages for different archs from packs folder #46911
    untriaged
  • Minor clean-up in redist-installer #46896
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't set explicit version for Microsoft.Build.NoTargets in project file #46894
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Avoid downloading unrelated arcade packages in DownloadPackages.csproj #46895
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Remove vertical priority list #46741
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Try to re-enable APICompat in aspnetcore #45872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix utility HaveStdErrContainingOnce #46893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not pass raw messages to string.Format #46479
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 9.0.3
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Use pipeline artifacts for final artifacts and enable caching #46796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • realpath in c# #45637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Write import map to html files #46233
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2645123 #46803
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add ExcludeFromCodeCoverage to template for MSTest, NUnit, XUnit #46866
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
